newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - J.P. Morgan starts Apasco.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - J.P. Morgan starts Apasco.

text.p: -- J.P. Morgan Securities Inc said on Monday it had started Mexico's Apasco SA de CV as a market performer.

-- In a statement, the brokerage said, "A steady domestic market recovery combined with recently realized Mexican cement price gains should lead to outstanding 68 percent growth in dollar cash earnings this year."
